LanguageData.AllowCannibal.label: allow food with human meat
LanguageData.AllowCannibal.description: Allow food that is acceptable to cannibals (i.e. it contains human meat). This accounts for meals whose classification depends on their ingredients.
LanguageData.AllowCarnivore.label: allow food with appetizing meat
LanguageData.AllowCarnivore.description: Allow food that is generally acceptable to meat eaters but unacceptable to vegetarians. This accounts for meals whose classification depends on their ingredients. This does not control human and insect meat.
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesSlave.label: дозволити трупи рабів
LanguageData.AllowInsectMeat.label: allow food with insect meat
LanguageData.AllowInsectMeat.description: Allow food that contains insect meat. This accounts for meals whose classification depends on their ingredients.
LanguageData.AllowVegetarian.label: allow vegetarian food
LanguageData.AllowVegetarian.description: Allow food that is acceptable to vegetarians but unacceptable to those that only eat meat. This accounts for meals whose classification depends on their ingredients.
